name: Spiral Classifier
overview: Spiral classifiers are designed to provide the most effective pool area and overflow velocity requirements. Actually, the spiral classifier is not only able to clean the ground mineral ore, but also separate the particles briefly.
technical:
Model 5LL-1500 5LL-1200 5LL-900 5LL-600 5LL-400
Outside  diamm 1500 1200 900 600 400
pitchmm 540,720 900,720,540 675,540,405 450,360,270 240,180
Pitch Dia Ratio 0.75,0.6,0.45 0.75,0.6,0.45 0.75,0.6,0.45 0.75,0.6,0.45 0.6,0.45
Lateral slope 9° 9° 9° 9° 9°
Maximum starts per column 4-2 4-2 4-2 3 2
Feeding Size (mm) 0.3-0.02 0.3-0.03 0.3-0.03 0.2-0.02 0.2-0.02
Feeding Density (%) 25-55 25-55 25-55 25-55 25-55
CapacityT/H 8-6 4-6 2-3 0.8-1.2 0.15-0.2
External Size Length (mm) 1560 1360 1060 700 460
Width (mm) 1560 1360 1060 700 460
Height (mm) 5230 5230 4000 2600 1500
Weight (Kg) 800 600 400 150 50
application: Spiral Classifiers are usually suitable for separating fine particles &liquid from coarse particles, separating light particles from heavy particles and grading particles according to their sizes.
